newsitem.title: FINLAND: LAROX RISES SHARPLY ON 1996 RESULT.
newsitem.headline: LAROX RISES SHARPLY ON 1996 RESULT.

text.p: Shares in Finnish industrial filters maker Larox Oy rose sharply on Wednesday after the company reported a seven-fold increase 1996 earnings on 1995, brokers and equities analysts said.
At 1315/1115 GMT the OTC-listed Larox traded at 60.00 markka, up 8.50 or more than 16 percent in two million markka trade -- lively for the usually little traded share.
"I has risen from 40.00 markka to 60.00 in just a few weeks, and so we could see some selling at these levels," one analyst said, but another said it could easily rise to 70.00.
